description: MainActivity.kt is a Kotlin source file defining the MainActivity class for an Android TV application. It manages a WebView that loads local HTML content ('home-page-1-2.html') with configuration settings to support local assets and JavaScript execution. The class handles lifecycle events like onCreate and onKeyDown, configuring WebView settings for optimal display and user interaction.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity for the Android TV application, managing a WebView that loads local HTML assets and handles user interactions.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the content view, configures WebView, and loads the local HTML page.

methods.name: configureWebView
methods.description: Sets up WebView settings to enable JavaScript, local file access, and other necessary configurations for proper rendering of local assets.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key events, providing back navigation support and key bindings for selection commands.
